text: Ayula nnyama anapwawije anepo kala, henga vino akapali, nang'e nni nfalume wa nane, na nni yumo wa avala vafalume saba,17:11 Apano palembwîjwe kwa Chimakonde, “yumo wa avala saba,” ìnahululika kuva, aneyo nfalume akee yumo wa avala vafalume saba, henga nni nfalume yunji alandâna navo.  nanang'e àhwena unaondongwa mwalehu.
